function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density in the city of Krakow","Impact":"High population density can lead to faster spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce population density in high-risk areas, increase healthcare capacity, and enforce strict hygiene and sanitation practices","Technologies":"Mobile apps for contact tracing, surveillance systems, and remote healthcare services","People":"Residents of Krakow, healthcare workers, students","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Presence of a large student population","Impact":"Large student population can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases through social interactions and communal living","Mitigation":"Enforce strict health and safety guidelines in educational institutions, promote vaccination, and increase access to healthcare services for students","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual healthcare consultations, and data analytics for monitoring disease spread","People":"Students, educational staff, local residents","Owner":"Educational institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Limited green spaces in the urban environment","Impact":"Limited green spaces may reduce opportunities for outdoor activities and compromise mental and physical well-being, leading to higher susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Expand and maintain urban green spaces, promote outdoor activities, and create accessible recreational areas for the public","Technologies":"Smart city planning tools, environmental monitoring sensors, and community engagement platforms","People":"Residents of Krakow, urban planners, public health advocates","Owner":"City government, environmental organizations"}]}
